TopicTitle: Source for machine readable game version info

Articles.Content:
Hi,

in order to automatically add new game versions to SpaceDock i need an machine readable source for game versions that updates as close to release as possible.

I tried steamdb but it only has build numbers.

Could the devs/community managers make those available (e.g. as API or simply URL i can scrape?)


BTW SpaceDock has an API of its own so mod other people can pull this data and more from there (see https://spacedock.info for documentation).
